experience.title: Product Growth Intern
experience.description: Worked on the improvement of their product: Upsurge.club, an ed-tech platform to boost India's financial literacy on stock markets through online courses• Increased paid users by 88% wihtin 2 months through UX optimization techniques, data-driven growth tactics and extended affiliate partnerships• Revamped the digital marketing strategy based on the insights form Google Analytics and Meta Pixel tools - leading to 160% growth in revenue• Achieved average daily visitors from 2K to 6K by leveraging search engine and content optimization - led to 3x increase in website traffic & engagement
experience.description_html: Worked on the improvement of their product: Upsurge.club, an ed-tech platform to boost India's financial literacy on stock markets through online courses• Increased paid users by 88% wihtin 2 months through UX optimization techniques, data-driven growth tactics and extended affiliate partnerships• Revamped the digital marketing strategy based on the insights form Google Analytics and Meta Pixel tools - leading to 160% growth in revenue• Achieved average daily visitors from 2K to 6K by leveraging search engine and content optimization - led to 3x increase in website traffic & engagement

experience.title: Business Analyst Intern
experience.description: Built interactive dashboards and funnels for Pixical, an ed-tech platform to help learners of all ages learn new skills online and engage with their passion• Identified key user behaviour patterns of chess players on chess.com based on user activity to increase user engagement with the product• Generated comprehensive reports analyzing user churn and correlating it with different user attributes, which helped the team improve user retention by 10%• Increased the efficiency 2-fold by conducting extensive data transformation and automating the processes by leveraging different functions in MS Excel
experience.description_html: Built interactive dashboards and funnels for Pixical, an ed-tech platform to help learners of all ages learn new skills online and engage with their passion• Identified key user behaviour patterns of chess players on chess.com based on user activity to increase user engagement with the product• Generated comprehensive reports analyzing user churn and correlating it with different user attributes, which helped the team improve user retention by 10%• Increased the efficiency 2-fold by conducting extensive data transformation and automating the processes by leveraging different functions in MS Excel

experience.title: Product Management Intern
experience.description: Worked on improving the retention funnel for a non-profit ed-tech organization, focused on catalyzing early childhood education and community engagement• Spearheaded the formation of the user research team and led 50+ user calls to gain a deeper understanding of our users' needs and pain points• Conducted a thorough analysis of the data collected by creating event funnels on the platform to understand user retention and key trends• Developed and validated several hypotheses for user retention by collaborating with respective Program Managers across 10 geographic regions
experience.description_html: Worked on improving the retention funnel for a non-profit ed-tech organization, focused on catalyzing early childhood education and community engagement• Spearheaded the formation of the user research team and led 50+ user calls to gain a deeper understanding of our users' needs and pain points• Conducted a thorough analysis of the data collected by creating event funnels on the platform to understand user retention and key trends• Developed and validated several hypotheses for user retention by collaborating with respective Program Managers across 10 geographic regions

experience.title: Technical Management Intern
experience.description: Worked on the strategic initiatives and process improvements of the Acquafront Infrastructure, an IIT-BHU incubated startup in the maritime industry• Assisted the leadership in designing and implementing a new organisational structure with an aim to improve efficiency and align with business goals• Oversaw the full-cycle recruitment process for new positions introduced, including job posting, sourcing candidates, and conducting interviews• Partnered with naval architect consultants to develop and implement best practices in product design & employee training reducing the project duration
experience.description_html: Worked on the strategic initiatives and process improvements of the Acquafront Infrastructure, an IIT-BHU incubated startup in the maritime industry• Assisted the leadership in designing and implementing a new organisational structure with an aim to improve efficiency and align with business goals• Oversaw the full-cycle recruitment process for new positions introduced, including job posting, sourcing candidates, and conducting interviews• Partnered with naval architect consultants to develop and implement best practices in product design & employee training reducing the project duration

experience.title: ThinkSwiss Awardee 2022
experience.description: • Implementing a flexible sex-estimation tool by looking at sequencing depth at sex chromosomes on the device ATLAS, which takes the BAM file as an input• Executed various simulations and tests through various statistical and graphical methods to verify the tool using the R programming language

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: ▪ Analysing over 50+ Cancer indicating mutations and their wild-type genes graphically using their DNA sequences to study the chaos in DNA• Performing Fractal Analysis and Lacunarity calculations on DNA walks generated and studying results comparatively with a team of 3 people▪ Tools using: FracLac, ImageJ
experience.description_html: ▪ Analysing over 50+ Cancer indicating mutations and their wild-type genes graphically using their DNA sequences to study the chaos in DNA• Performing Fractal Analysis and Lacunarity calculations on DNA walks generated and studying results comparatively with a team of 3 people▪ Tools using: FracLac, ImageJ <!---->

experience.title: Project Intern
experience.description: ▪	Supervisor: Prof. Debasis Das (Department of Biological Sciences, TIFR Mumbai)▪	Studying the sequences of proteins and determining their specificity of folding as soon as they leave the ribosome tunnel• Formulated a mathematical model using the python script for real-time prediction of Amino Acid distribution from the length of a protein• Analysed the hydropathic character of a protein v/s length of the protein, which gives information on the hydrophobic collapse of proteins
experience.description_html: ▪ Supervisor: Prof. Debasis Das (Department of Biological Sciences, TIFR Mumbai)▪ Studying the sequences of proteins and determining their specificity of folding as soon as they leave the ribosome tunnel• Formulated a mathematical model using the python script for real-time prediction of Amino Acid distribution from the length of a protein• Analysed the hydropathic character of a protein v/s length of the protein, which gives information on the hydrophobic collapse of proteins <!---->
experience.company: Tata Institute of Fundamental Research, Mumbai

honors_and_awards.title: ThinkSwiss Research Fellowship 2022
honors_and_awards.description: ThinkSwiss Research Scholarships is a program that opens doors for students from India, Singapore, and Australia to the Swiss academia world, combining a high-quality curriculum with innovative thinking. Selected students are provided with an opportunity to act as a "student ambassador" to promote Swiss research.

honors_and_awards.title: First Runner Up at Manthan 2020, BITS Hyderabad
honors_and_awards.description: First runner up in Annual Case Study Competition of student-run NGOs conducted by Manthan 2020, Nirmaan Organization of BITS Hyderabad which drew a participation of over 10 NGOs across the nation.
